highlights.head: Opportunities unlocked for learner
highlights.description: Designed to bridge the gap between theoretical knowledge and industry-specific coding skills. Programmers will be well preparde for the interview processes of various big-wigs.Excel all your programming interviews by developing an efficient approach to find optimized solutions.Get placed at companies like Amazon, Google, Microsoft, Directi etc.

highlights.head: Hands on Projects and Problems:
highlights.description: In-depth Discussion on Important Computer Science Topics Like OS, DBMS etc.Extensive Data Structures & Algorithmic Coverage.Assignments on the questions asked in Google and other BigWigs.

highlights.head: Why choose CB Live:
highlights.description: Two-Way Interaction: Share screen with your mentor for any doubt resolution 24*7.Placement Support: From Interview recommendations to placement, we are there for you at every step.Get into Bigwigs: Our expert will help you crack interviews for Amazon, Microsoft, Apple, Google, and Facebook.

highlights.head: This course is essential for you:
highlights.description: Any student with prior knowledge of fundamentals in either C++ or Java.Who do not have idea how to start preparing for BigWigs.Who wants the material at one place and needs expert help.

studentsSay.name: Anshul Mittal
studentsSay.story: Coding Blocks helped in gaining enough experience to get internships at giants like Google and Rubrik.

studentsSay.name: Sidharth Bansal
studentsSay.story: Hii I am Sidharth Bansal from Delhi technology university. I have done competitive boot camp from coding blocks. This gave me a great exposure to problem solving mindset.

studentsSay.name: Samarth Jain
studentsSay.story: My journey in the world of Competitive Programming started with the Bootcamp at Coding Blocks, which turned out to be a changing point in my life. The immense amount of knowledge I got during the course did not only develop my interest but also made me pursue this field later. A special thanks to Shubham bhaiya, Mayank bhaiya and Prateek bhaiya for being the guiding lights in my journey and always motivating us to follow our passion!

schedule.description: Divide & Conquer and meet in the middle
Advance DS(Segment Tree and Fenwick Tree and DSU)
